author: Monica Chin
title: Sling is offering free TV every evening for new customers
description: Sling is providing free TV from 5PM to midnight each night, as part of “Happy Hour Across America,” a new initiative to encourage Americans to stay home.
content:
You can access 32 live channels
Sling is providing free TV from 5PM to midnight each night, as part of a new initiative to encourage Americans to stay home. Starting today, new Sling TV customers can register for the service, which the company is calling Hap… [+875 chars]
